videodata module¶

videodata.frames2video(image_input_folder_path, video_output_path)¶
videodata.video2frames(videopath, videoName)¶

This function is used to convert video into images. :param videopath: path to the video. :param videoName: name of the video eg. greyscalevideo.mp4

Returns

path to the splitted images.
